name: casa-de-padua
description: Sitio web del Club Atletico San Antonio de Padua

scripts.copy-win: copy src\index.html dist\ && xcopy src\js dist\js\ /E /I /Y
scripts.copy-unix: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp -r src/js dist/
scripts.copy: node -e "require('fs').existsSync('/bin/bash') ? process.exit(0) : process.exit(1)" && npm run copy-unix || npm run copy-win
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run copy
